title: Constant lag during abilities that charge
body:
So one of my favorite champions to play is Vi, but i end up basically playing down my Q. Whenever i use the Q ability "when it charges up" i get lag. So more or less i constantly have to guess where the target i'm Q'ing towards is going to be the moment i start casting the ability.

This issue happens with every champ that has a charged ability, but doesn't happen with champions who have a cast time. So the lag affects Vlad E and Xerath Q aswell (these are the only champions i play with charged abilities, so i don't know if Sion Q is affected)

Anyone potentially understand why this happens, and how i might be able to fix this? It's been a constant issue for the last year, and i can't remember when it started so i haven't a clue what instigated the issue.

replies.body: It's still happening after doing that. Thinking about recording a vod and post it as to demonstrate what exactly is happening.

It's strange to hear that this only happens for charged abilities, and I wonder if there could be an issue with your config that's causing issues with your input.  As a first step, try resetting your config to see if it helps.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Test it in a custom, and let me know!
